subject: Sexual Health
title: The Emotional Toll of Infertility
description: A short lesson to help you apply The Emotional Toll of Infertility.

hook.text: Infertility affects one in six couples worldwide, causing grief, shame, and strain on relationships.

buildup.text: Studies show that infertility patients experience anxiety and depression levels similar to those with cancer.

discovery.text: The cycle of hope and disappointment each month creates a unique emotional rollercoaster with no clear endpoint.

twist.text: Many cultures attach stigma to infertility, adding social isolation to an already painful private struggle.

climax.text: Therapy, support groups, and open conversation can transform infertility from a silent burden into a shared one.

punchline.text: One in six couples. Far too many suffer in silence.
